title: Kicked out of a game today
body: Just had a game where I got disconnected and when I relogged in ( a few seconds after) I couldn't reconnect.  I could immediately queue up and play another game. Just thought I bring this to your attention. Was really strange.

replies.body: Usually happens when everyone gets kicked out of the game for one reason or another. Shouldn't affect you in any way and is just a little blip. It happens every now and again but isn't a significant issue.
